content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Farhad Abbasi.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed upon price was 650 Euros a month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I am satisfied with the outcome of the negotiation. On a scale from 1 to 10, I would rate it an 8.
name: Peter Schmidt
